collection.name: Ambling Pearl
collection.openText: That shell... that damned shell...! What comes out of there....

observe.desc:
[ {Record 1: O-02-21-11 Recorder: Colored Staff
~Start Recording~.
Colored Staff: Work order to O-02-21-11... I'm on my way.
~Colored staff member enters the housing room and attempts to start work~.
Colored Staff: Ugh...I think I'm going to throw up...it stinks like hell.... Let's finish the work as soon as possible...
～Colored Staff proceeds with the work...
Colored Staff: Why does it smell so... bad...? Is the substance coming out of there bad?
～Colored Staff vomits...
Colored Staff: That's not just a bunch of filth! That's... there's a lot of ■■ in that ■■■■■!} ]

[ {Record 2: O-02-21-11
From Record 1, we found the cause of the foul odor from the O-02-21-11 housing unit. It is caused by the substance being produced from O-02-21-11. That was....I don't want to record any more of this. If you are going to work on O-02-21-11, please work with personnel of high mental capacity.} ]

[ {Record 3: O-02-21-11 Recorder: Ten Staffer
The following is a record of the escape of O-02-21-11
Announcement: O-02-21-11 has escaped. The instructed personnel should proceed to suppress O-02-21-11.
Ten Staffer: Damn! Why is that smell so potent? I'm not even at O-02-21-11 yet!
～Ten Staffer looks around~
Ten Staffer: What is it? Wait... This green slime... is this the cause of the stench? We can't focus with this stuff around, so lets destroy it on the way!
～Just as the Ten Staffer is about to destroy the substance, O-02-21-11 entered the area.} ]

[ {Ten Staffer: What? Is it trying to eat this stuff? That can't be good... I'd better destroy it before it gets the chance.
～Ten Staffer interupts the Abnormality, and is successful in destroying the substance.
Ten Staffer: Ugh, this things surprisingly nimble... Eh? What's happening now?
～At the same time, the same substance was confirmed to have been destroyed at another location.
Ten Staffer: It popped open... Well, its easier to hit like this. I guess I'll aim for that shining pearl there.
~ Successful suppression of O-02-21-11 ~.
Based on the above record, if O-02-21-11 has escaped, destroy the material that appeared, and if O-02-21-11 has opened, aim for the pearl. Note: Do not allow O-02-21-11 to take in the substance.} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: At the beginning of the day, $0 owned 5 green mucus. $0 could acquire up to 20 green mucus.
At the end of the work, the staff member who was doing the work received WHITE damage. Also, if the work result was good, the Qliphoth Counter decreased and $0 gained 3 green mucus.
If the work result was bad, the Qliphoth Counter increased and $0 lost 3 green mucus.

When the green mucus count reached 10 or more, or was lowered to 0, $0's Qliphoth Counter lowered to 0. During the breakout, $0 fixed the amount of green mucus it possesed to 10, and three green slime appeared in the facility. The green slime took vastly increased damage when attacked by $0.

If a green slime was defeated by a staff member, $0's green mucus count was reduced by 3. If $0 was suppressed by a staff member, $0's green mucus was increased by 3. Also, when a green slime was destroyed, a new green slime appeared somewhere in the facility.

During the escape, if $0's green mucus was reduced to 0, $0 stopped moving and $0's resistances were greatly weakened. However, after 30 seconds had passed in this state, $0 gained 10 green mucus and its resistances were restored.
